name: A. Police Recruits
statement:
The police department of your city has just started its journey.
Initially, they don t have any manpower. So, they started hiring new
recruits in groups.Meanwhile, crimes keeps occurring within the city.
One member of the police force can investigate only one crime during
his/her lifetime.If there is no police officer free (isn’t busy with
crime) during the occurrence of a crime, it will go untreated.Given the
chronological order of crime occurrences and recruit hirings, find the
number of crimes which will go untreated.
